Attraction.Name: Desaru Coast Adventure Waterpark
Attraction.Description: Splash into fun with thrilling slides, wave pools, and family zones in Johor’s premier waterpark.

Attraction.Name: Legoland Malaysia
Attraction.Description: Experience LEGO-themed rides, shows, and water fun in Malaysia’s top family resort.
Attraction.OpeningHours: Mon, Thu–Sun: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM | Tue: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM | Closed Wed

Attraction.Name: Kota Tinggi Firefly Park
Attraction.Description: Witness glowing fireflies along tranquil mangrove rivers under the night sky.

Attraction.Name: Zoo Negara
Attraction.Description: Meet over 5,000 animals, including pandas, in Malaysia’s national zoo.

Attraction.Name: Kuala Lumpur Bird Park
Attraction.Description: Explore the world’s largest free-flight aviary with exotic birds all around you.

Attraction.Name: Aquaria KLCC
Attraction.Description: Journey through ocean tunnels and interactive exhibits at KL’s top aquarium.

Attraction.Name: Central Market
Attraction.Description: Explore a cultural landmark with local crafts, food, and heritage art.

Attraction.Name: Langkawi SkyCab & Sky Bridge
Attraction.Description: Ride a cable car to stunning views and cross the iconic sky bridge above the rainforest.
Attraction.OpeningHours: Daily: 9:30 AM – 6:00 PM (Wed: starts 12:30 PM; Peak up to 10:00 PM)

Attraction.Name: Kota Mahsuri
Attraction.Description: Step into Langkawi’s most legendary story in this traditional complex.
Attraction.OpeningHours: Daily: 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM (Theatre: Fri 3:30 PM, Sat 3:00 PM; holidays include Sun)

Attraction.Name: Tanjung Rhu Beach
Attraction.Description: Relax on Langkawi’s most beautiful white-sand beach with clear blue water.

Attraction.Name: Jonker Street
Attraction.Description: Walk Melaka’s famous street full of culture, food, and weekend night markets.
Attraction.OpeningHours: Shops: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM | Market: Fri–Sun 6:00 PM – 12:00 AM

Attraction.Name: A Famosa
Attraction.Description: Visit the remains of a Portuguese fort and relive Melaka’s colonial history.

Attraction.Name: Maritime Museum
Attraction.Description: Board a ship-shaped museum to explore Melaka’s trading past.
Attraction.OpeningHours: Mon–Thu: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM | Fri: 9:00 AM – 6:30 PM | Sat–Sun: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM

Attraction.Name: Annah Rais Longhouse
Attraction.Description: Experience Bidayuh traditions in a real longhouse village near Kuching.

Attraction.Name: Mantanani Island
Attraction.Description: Escape to crystal-clear waters and tranquil beaches on this hidden Sabah island.

Attraction.Name: Stand-Up Paddleboarding
Attraction.Description: Enjoy calm waves and scenic paddling along Kota Kinabalu’s coast.

Attraction.Name: Sarawak Cultural Village
Attraction.Description: See Sarawak’s ethnic cultures brought to life in this open-air museum.

Attraction.Name: Niah Caves
Attraction.Description: Explore prehistoric caves with ancient paintings and archaeological wonders.
Attraction.OpeningHours: Mon–Fri: 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM | Weekends: 9:00 AM – 3:00 PM

Attraction.Name: Semenggoh Wildlife Centre
Attraction.Description: Catch a glimpse of orangutans roaming free in a protected reserve.

Attraction.Name: Sepilok Orangutan Centre
Attraction.Description: Meet rescued orangutans at Sabah’s famous rehabilitation sanctuary.

Attraction.Name: Bohey Dulang Island
Attraction.Description: Hike up to panoramic island views and discover coral-filled lagoons.
